bug.author: shabazpatel
bug.summary: Error while running task with sdk
bug.description:
Error while running example, examples/python/task_run_iris_sklearn_basic
Adding default Dockerfile in datmo/examples/python would solve the problem since default Dockerfile doesn't have required libraries Following error is also observed,
<denchmark-code>test accuracy: 0.947368421053 Traceback (most recent call last): File "basic_task.py", line 21, in <module> print("files: ", task.files()) TypeError: 'list' object is not callable </denchmark-code>
